subject: Re: [junit] ExpectedException: expecting a cause's message
msgSnippet: As a general rule, I only test the messages of exceptions I m creating and throwing myself, in languages that support it. And then only to test that I m
messageBody:
As a general rule, I only test the messages of exceptions I'm creating and
throwing myself, in languages that support it. And then only to test that
I'm setting the message correctly.

Charlie
